intro.subtitle: Certified Professionals
intro.description: Say goodbye to the hassles of an in-house financial team! Allowing you to focus on what truly matters while we handle your financial needs with expertise and efficiency.

about.title: WE SERVE A DIVERSE RANGE OF CLIENTS FROM ACROSS THE GLOBE
about.aboutCEO: With over a decade of experience, Finansist has evolved from a local service provider to a globally recognized. Serving clients across the world, specializing in international regulations. We leverage cutting-edge technology to deliver seamless bookkeeping and tax preparation services, no matter where you are. Based in Indonesia, our strategic location allows us to offer cost-effective solutions that consistently exceed expectations, providing exceptional value compared to other markets.

description.subtitle: Saving your hiring costs with more benefits
description.description: Our international certified professionals will handle your needs with precision for seamless, cost-effective results and no drama.

description.subtitle: We provide a service that is meets to your needs
description.description: Share with us the overview of your company's current situation, so we can provide a proposal that is fair and meets to your needs. We believe accounting is a critical foundation for business success, but it should never become a burden.

description.subtitle: Our services are adapted to your capabilities
description.description: With a flexible approach, we delivering maximum value without excessive costs. Let's work together to create efficient and affordable accounting solutions to support your business growth.

financialSupport.title: Unlock Expert Financial Support with Zero Worries!

points.title: Prioritize Data Security
points.description: Your financial data is safe with usâ€”protected by cutting-edge security measures.

points.title: Precision in Reporting
points.description: Rely on accurate, timely financial schedules and reports that keep you informed and in control.

points.title: Seamless System Integration
points.description: We expertly navigate many accounting applications and systems, ensuring smooth operations.

points.title: 24/7 Global Communication
points.description: Get round-the-clock support, no matter where you are in the world.

points.title: Uncompromising Compliance
points.description: Rest easy knowing your business is fully compliant with both local and international regulations (GAAP, IFRS, and more).

items.title: Accounting & Bookkeeping
benefits: Preparation of financial statements (e.g., balance sheet, income statement, cash flow statement)
Chart of accounts setup and maintenance
Bank, credit card, and loan reconciliation

details.overview: Our services focus on delivering end-to-end financial management solutions that encompass accurate preparation of financial statements, efficient bookkeeping, and cash flow optimization. We streamline accounting processes with robust general ledger maintenance, reconciliation, and expense tracking. Through custom reporting, variance analysis, and tailored business insights, we enable informed decision-making. Additionally, we ensure seamless accounts payable, receivable, and payroll management, alongside effective budgeting and forecasting to support strategic growth and financial stability.
extendedServices: Operational Efficiency and Cash Flow Optimization

items.title: Tax Report and Planning
benefits: Income tax preparation and filing (corporate, individual, and partnership)
Indonesian national taxes and local tax authority representatio
Assistance with VAT, international tax, and fiscal adjustmen

details.overview: Our tax services provide comprehensive solutions to meet all your tax compliance and planning needs. We ensure accurate preparation and filing of income tax returns for individuals, corporations, and partnerships, alongside full compliance with VAT/GST, sales tax, and withholding tax regulations. Our strategic tax planning and advisory services are designed to minimize liabilities, maximize savings, and address complex tax issues like international tax and fiscal adjustments. We also offer professional representation with tax authorities and assist with tax audits, ensuring smooth and compliant operations. Customized solutions are tailored to your business needs, offering insights into tax credits, deductions, and strategies for optimizing financial outcomes.
extendedServices: Customized Solutions for Complex Tax Needs

items.title: CFO Management
benefits: Strategic financial leadership to align business goals with financial strategies.
Oversight of accounting teams and processes to ensure efficiency and accuracy.
Business performance analysis to evaluate KPIs and identify improvement opportunities.
In-depth financial planning and strategy, ensuring long-term growth and market adaptability.
Cost control and reduction strategies to improve profit margins.
Operational efficiency optimization to streamline processes and reduce inefficiencies.
Comprehensive financial analysis, including management reports and break-even assessments.
Performance monitoring with KPI tracking to ensure strategic goals are achieved.
Financial risk management to mitigate potential threats to business stability.
Long-term financial planning and budgeting for sustained success

details.overview: This enhanced CFO Service is designed to provide businesses with strategic financial leadership, actionable insights, and comprehensive operational support, enabling success in today's competitive market.
extendedServices: Our CFO Service provides holistic financial leadership, strategic advisory, and performance optimization to drive business growth, stability, and operational excellence. We combine financial strategy with in-depth management accounting, business advisory, and operational insights to ensure your company achieves its long-term objectives.

Strategic Financial Leadership ensures that your financial strategies support sustainable growth. Our team provides oversight of accounting teams and processes, ensuring accurate financial reporting and efficient operations, while establishing best practices for streamlined workflows.

Through business performance and financial strategy advisory, we conduct comprehensive business performance analysis, evaluate KPIs, and develop long-term financial plans aligned with your business goals. This ensures operational optimization and profitability improvements.

Our management accounting and performance optimization services include management reporting, cost-benefit and break-even analysis, and KPI tracking. These allow for precise, data-driven decision-making to enhance operational efficiency and reduce costs.

Additionally, our financial risk management services identify potential risks and implement strategies to mitigate them, ensuring your business remains resilient in a dynamic market. Combined with cost control and optimization, we help reduce operational expenses while maintaining quality and productivity.
Finally, long-term financial planning and budgeting ensure proper resource allocation and adaptability to market changes, providing a roadmap for sustainable growth.

items.title: Audit, Assurance, and Risk Management Services
benefits: Due diligence for mergers and acquisitions

details.overview: Our audit and assurance services provide a comprehensive approach to financial transparency, risk management, and operational efficiency. We conduct both internal and external audits, including financial statement audits and forensic audits, to ensure accuracy and detect any discrepancies or fraud. Our compliance audits assess adherence to regulatory requirements, while risk assessment and management services help identify and mitigate potential financial risks. Additionally, we perform performance audits to evaluate and improve operational effectiveness, offering valuable insights for enhanced productivity. In strategic business support, we offer due diligence services for mergers and acquisitions, ensuring thorough evaluations of financial health and risks to facilitate informed decision-making. These services collectively ensure financial integrity, compliance, and improved performance, providing a solid foundation for business growth and success.

items.title: Payroll and Employee Benefits Management Services
benefits: Payroll tax compliance and reporting/ Reporting of Employee PPh 21 (Indonesia)
Employee benefits administration/ or BPJS Kesehatan (Indonesia) and other additional
Managing retirement plans and superannuation/ or BPJS Ketenagakerjaan (Indonesia)

details.overview: Our payroll and employee benefits services ensure efficient and compliant management of all aspects of employee compensation and welfare. We handle accurate payroll calculation and processing, generating payslips and payment summaries for transparency. Our services include ensuring full tax compliance, including Reporting of Employee PPh 21 in Indonesia, and managing employee tax deductions to prevent issues with tax authorities. We also manage employee benefits, including health coverage (BPJS Kesehatan) and retirement plans (BPJS Ketenagakerjaan), ensuring full compliance with local regulations. Additionally, we oversee retirement and superannuation plans, providing employees with long-term financial security while ensuring timely and correct contributions. These services are designed to support both employers and employees, ensuring smooth payroll operations and employee satisfaction.

items.title: Specialized Reporting and Costume Made Services
benefits: Standard Operational Procedure and Flowchart assessment and planning
Industry-specific accounting (e.g., for construction, e-commerce, manufacture, or others)

details.overview: Our fraud detection and operational optimization services protect businesses while improving efficiency through advanced fraud detection, reporting, and prevention measures, alongside streamlined Standard Operational Procedures (SOP) and flowchart assessments to eliminate bottlenecks and enhance effectiveness. By combining e-commerce sales reporting to track key metrics and optimize strategies with specialized accounting services tailored to industries like construction, e-commerce, and manufacturing, we address unique financial challenges and regulatory requirements. Our project-based accounting solutions ensure precise cost tracking and budget monitoring for profitability, while inventory and cost accounting systems optimize stock management and production costs. Together, these services deliver real-time insights, enhance operational performance, and drive overall profitability.
extendedServices: Standard Operational Procedure (SOP) and Risk Optimization

items.title: Accounting Software Implementation and Support Services
benefits: Accounting software setup (e.g., QuickBooks, Xero, Accurate, etc.)
Checking the validity of the software currently in use

details.overview: Our accounting software and system implementation services are designed to enhance your financial management with modern, efficient solutions. We begin with accounting software setup, ensuring platforms like QuickBooks and Xero are configured to suit your business needs, ensuring accurate financial tracking. We offer comprehensive software training and ongoing support, empowering your team to maximize the software's capabilities and resolve any technical issues promptly. Our services also include cloud-based accounting system implementation, allowing your business to benefit from flexible, real-time access to financial data while maintaining security. Finally, we handle data migration and integration, ensuring a smooth transition from your previous systems to the new software without data loss, while integrating multiple financial tools to streamline your operations. These services help businesses improve their accounting processes, enhance efficiency, and reduce manual errors.

items.title: Internship
items.description: Finansist International gives opportunities for students or fresh-graduates to build experience with us in our internship program.

items.title: Job Vacancy
items.description: Finansist International gives opportunities to join with our company. Look forward to opportunities and developments with us!

items.title: Business Partner
items.description: Finansist International opens opportunities to cooperation in order to develop better services. For those of you who interested to grow with us, feel free to contact us!

questions.question: How do I get started with Finansist's services?
questions.answer: To get started, you can visit the website finansistinternational.com and contact the Finansist team through the available information. The Finansist team will assist you with the next steps to start using the services. If you have other questions not covered in this FAQ, feel free to reach out to the Finansist team directly for further information and support.
